tasks.title: Create Wellness Blog Detail Screen
tasks.description: Create a detailed blog reading screen with clean typography, share functionality, bookmark option, and related article suggestions. Include author information and publication date.

tasks.title: Create Ayurvedic Food Recommendation Screen
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive food recommendation screen with seasonal menus, dosha-specific diets, recipe details with ingredients and preparation steps, and nutritional information. Include shopping list functionality.

tasks.title: Create Favorites Management Screen
tasks.description: Create a dedicated favorites screen where users can view all saved techniques, articles, and recipes in categorized tabs. Include sorting options, search functionality, and bulk management features.

tasks.title: Create Progress Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Create a detailed analytics dashboard showing practice trends, streak history, time distribution across techniques, achievement badges, and personalized insights. Include export functionality for progress reports.

tasks.title: Add Navigation to Home Screen
tasks.description: Enhance the home screen with bottom navigation for easy access to different sections: Home, Techniques, Progress, Resources, and Profile. Implement smooth transitions and active state indicators.
